title: Part 1 Sequential Conversation – Outlet Hours Example
description: Demonstrates slot tracking across three related turns covering the Petaling Jaya → SS 2 outlet scenario.

turns.content: Is there an outlet in Petaling Jaya?
Yes, which outlet are you referring to?
Ah yes, the SS 2 outlet opens at 9:00AM.
turns.notes: Tool response summarizing outlet hours from Text2SQL result.
